message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10000. It's a great deal, as it's worth $12000 to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than $6000.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $6000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit, but I need to get at least $8500 to make this worthwhile.  Let's meet in the middle.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $6000 and $8500, so I'll offer $7500.
